title: PMS 2.0 739 - Everything DB With Darius Butler In Studio, Nate Boyer, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about Pete Carroll's comments to the Seattle media after the game that raises a lot of questions about his relationship with Russell Wilson in the wake of the Seahawks' big win over the Broncos, Nathaniel Hackett's comments about his late game clock management, and they look at some of the best film from this past week, while beginning to look ahead to the Thursday Night Matchup. Joining the progrum to chat about his new movie MVP and how incredible of an experience it was is Green Beret, former Long Snapper for the Seattle Seahawks, co-owner of Merging Vets & Players, and now actor, Nate Boyer (1:28:52-1:54:43). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
